name: Slime Escape (Grear0)
description:
Slime Escape is a co-op 2d puzzle platformer where you play as two slime who must cooperate and solve puzzles using their special size changing ability in order to escape the dungeon they are trapped in.

This game was made by Kevin couper and myself for a first year school project during our game design module.

I designed the levels and developed most of the game while my partner helped me with some ideas, menus, design and bug fixing.
